Package interfaces

Interface IAdministratorView

All Known Implementing Classes:
AdminView, AppointmentsView, ManageHospStaff, StaffView, ViewAndManageInventory
public interface IAdministratorView
The IAdministratorView interface defines the methods that the administrator view must implement to interact with the administrator and display various information.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    displayAppointments(List<Appointment> appointments)
    Displays the list of scheduled appointments.
    void
    displayInventory(List<Inventory> inventory)
    Displays the inventory list, showing medications and their details.
    void
    displayListOfStaff(List<Staff> staffList)
    Displays the list of hospital staff members.
    void
    displayMenu()
    Displays the administrator's main menu.
    int
    getMenuChoice()
    Retrieves the user's choice from the displayed menu.

  • Method Details

    • displayMenu

      void displayMenu()
      Displays the administrator's main menu.

    • displayListOfStaff

      void displayListOfStaff(List<Staff> staffList)
      Displays the list of hospital staff members.
      Parameters:
      staffList - The list of staff to be displayed.

    • displayAppointments

      void displayAppointments(List<Appointment> appointments)
      Displays the list of scheduled appointments.
      Parameters:
      appointments - The list of appointments to be displayed.

    • displayInventory

      void displayInventory(List<Inventory> inventory)
      Displays the inventory list, showing medications and their details.
      Parameters:
      inventory - The list of inventory items to be displayed.

    • getMenuChoice

      int getMenuChoice()
      Retrieves the user's choice from the displayed menu.
      Returns:
      The user's menu choice as an integer.
